item.title: Develop IAS
item.author: pavel.polushkin@gmail.com (Pavel Polushkin)
item.description: Implement solutions that use virtual machines (VM) Provision VMs Azure VM Linux VM azure cli Create ARM templates Azure Resource Manager overview* Understand the structure and syntax of Azure Resource Manager templates* Template best practices Configure Azure Disk Encryption for VMs Disk encription ovetview Prerequisites Turn encription on Implement batch jobs by using Azure Batch Services Manage batch jobs by using Batch Service API Main page How it works *
